page.pageName: Birthday Week 2023 - Updates and Announcements - LIVE

metaTags.metaDescription: This week we'll celebrate our 13th birthday. As has become our tradition, we'll be announcing a series of products that we think of as our gifts back to the Internet. See what has been announced during the week.

relatedBlades.title: Welcome to Birthday Week 2023
relatedBlades.copy: 2023 marks Cloudflare's 13th birthday, and each day this week we will announce new products and host fascinating discussions with guests including product experts, customers, and industry peers.

features.title: Welcome to Birthday Week 2023
features.description:
Building the future is, in part, what Birthday Week is about. Over the past 13 years we've announced things like Universal SSL (doubling the size of the encrypted web overnight and helping to usher in the largely encrypted web we all use; Cloudflare Radar shows that worldwide 99% of HTTP requests are encrypted), or Cloudflare Workers (helping change the way people build and scale applications), or unmetered DDoS protection (to help with the scourge of DDoS).
This year will be no different.

features.title: Birthday Week recap: everything we announced — plus an AI-powered opportunity for startups
features.description: Need a recap or refresher on all the big Birthday Week news this week? This recap has you covered

features.title: Switching to Cloudflare can cut your network carbon emissions up to 96% (and we're joining the SBTi)
features.description: We're excited to share an independent report published this week that found that switching enterprise network services from on premises devices to Cloudflare services can cut related carbon emissions up to 96%, depending on your current network footprint. Switching to Cloudflare can cut your network carbon emissions up to 96% (and SBTi)

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Carbon/Emissions Report and Customer Use case
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Carbon/Emissions Report and Customer Use case

features.title: Cloudflare Account Permissions, how to use them, and best practices
features.description: Cloudflare has a lot of new roles, how should we use them, and how can we stay safe

features.title: How Cloudflare's systems dynamically route traffic across the globe
features.description: Meet the smartest member of the Cloudflare network team that helps keep you online no matter what happens to the Internet underneath us.

features.title: Announcing Cloudflare Incident Alerts
features.description: Customers may now subscribe to Cloudflare Incident Alerts and choose when to get notified based on affected products and level of impact.

features.title: Cloudflare Fonts: enhancing website font privacy and speed
features.description: Introducing Cloudflare Fonts. Enhance privacy and performance for websites using Google Fonts by loading fonts from their own origin. Improve user privacy, enhance site performance, and simplify the process. No need for code changes. Simply enable Cloudflare Fonts in your dashboard.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Fonts - Previously known as Fast Fonts
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Fonts - Previously known as Fast Fonts

features.title: Traffic transparency: Unleashing the power of Cloudflare Trace
features.description: Today, we are excited to announce Cloudflare Trace! Cloudflare Trace is available to all our customers. Cloudflare Trace enables you to understand how HTTP requests traverse your zone's configuration and what Cloudflare Rules are being applied to the request.

features.title: Cloudflare Stream Low-Latency HLS support now in Open Beta
features.description: Cloudflare Stream's LL-HLS support enters open beta today. You can deliver video to your audience faster, reducing the latency a viewer may experience on their player to as little as 3 seconds.

features.title: Amazon's $2bn IPv4 tax — and how you can avoid paying it
features.description: In this blog, we'll explain a little bit more about the technology involved, but most importantly, give you a step-by-step walkthrough of how Cloudflare can help you not only eliminate the need to pay Amazon for something that they shouldn't be charging you for in the first place

features.title: Welcome to connectivity cloud: the modern way to connect and protect your clouds, networks, applications and users
features.description: Surveys of IT and security leaders indicate that 72% would highly value a secure "any-to-any" cloud platform. And they said they would invest an average of 16% of their entire IT and security budget in such a platform.

features.title: Gone offline: how Cloudflare Radar detects Internet outages
features.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

features.title: Image optimization made simpler and more predictable: we're merging Cloudflare Images and Image Resizing
features.description: We're changing how we bill for Image Resizing to let you calculate your monthly costs more accurately and reliably. All Image Resizing features will be available under Cloudflare Images.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Images - Merge Images with Image Resizing
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Images - Merge Images with Image Resizing

features.title: Sippy helps you avoid egress fees while incrementally migrating data from S3 to R2
features.description: Use Sippy to incrementally migrate data from S3 to R2 as it's requested and avoid migration-specific egress fees

features.title: Traffic anomalies and notifications with Cloudflare Radar
features.description: Cloudflare Radar now displays country and ASN traffic anomalies in the Outage Center as they are detected, as well as publishing anomaly information via API. We are also launching Radar notifications, enabling users to subscribe to notifications about traffic anomalies, confirmed Internet outages, route leaks, or route hijacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Traffic Anomalies and Notifications on Cloudflare Radar
imageAssetFile.title: Traffic Anomalies and Notifications on Cloudflare Radar

features.title: The best place on Region: Earth for inference
features.description: Today, we're excited to make a series of announcements that we believe will make a similar impact as Workers did in the future of computing.

imageAssetFile.altText: The best place on Region: Earth for inference
imageAssetFile.title: The best place on Region: Earth for inference

features.title: Announcing AI Gateway: making AI applications more observable, reliable, and scalable
features.description: AI Gateway helps developers have greater control and visibility in their AI apps, so that you can focus on building without worrying about observability, reliability, and scaling. AI Gateway handles the things that nearly all AI applications need, saving you engineering time so you can focus on what you're building.

features.title: Cloudflare's 2023 Annual Founders' Letter
features.description: Cloudflare is officially a teenager. We launched on September 27, 2010. Today we celebrate our thirteenth birthday.

features.title: Partnering with Hugging Face to make deploying AI easier and more affordable than ever
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce that we are partnering with Hugging Face to make AI models more accessible and affordable than ever before to developers.

features.title: Vectorize: a vector database for shipping AI-powered applications to production, fast
features.description: Vectorize is our brand-new vector database offering, designed to let you build full-stack, AI-powered applications entirely on Cloudflare's global network: and you can start building with it right away.

features.title: You can now use WebGPU in Cloudflare Workers
features.titleUrl: You can now use WebGPU in Cloudflare Workers
features.description: Today, we are introducing WebGPU support to Cloudflare Workers. This blog will explain why it's important, why we did it, how you can use it, and what comes next

features.title: What AI companies are building with Cloudflare
features.description: What AI applications can you build with Cloudflare? Instead of us telling you we reached out to a small handful of the numerous AI companies using Cloudflare to learn a bit about what they're building and how Cloudflare is helping them on their journey.

features.title: Hyperdrive: making databases feel like they're global
features.description: Want to make the existing regional database in your legacy cloud provider much, much faster? Well you're in luck: we've just launched Hyperdrive, which dramatically speeds up queries you make to databases you already have from Cloudflare Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Hyperdrive: Making Databases Feel Like They're Global
imageAssetFile.title: Hyperdrive: Making Databases Feel Like They're Global

features.title: A Socket API that works across JavaScript runtimes — announcing a WinterCG spec and polyfill for connect()
features.description: Today, we're sharing that we've reached a new milestone in the path to making the TCP Sockets API available across JavaScript runtimes. Engineers from Cloudflare and Vercel have published a specification of the connect() sockets API for review by the community, along with a Node.js compatible implementation of connect() that developers can start using today.

imageAssetFile.altText: A Socket API that works across JavaScript runtimes — announcing a WinterCG spec and polyfill for connect()
imageAssetFile.title: A Socket API that works across JavaScript runtimes — announcing a WinterCG spec and polyfill for connect()

features.title: Cloudflare Integrations Marketplace introduces three new partners: Sentry, Momento and Turso
features.description: Earlier this year, we introduced integrations with Supabase, PlanetScale, Neon and Upstash. Today, we are thrilled to introduce our newest additions to Cloudflare's Integrations Marketplace – Sentry, Turso and Momento

features.title: Cloudflare is now powering Microsoft Edge Secure Network
features.description: We're announcing that Microsoft Edge is leveraging Cloudflare's Privacy Proxy technology, a key part of Cloudflare's privacy stack, to enable its Edge Secure Network feature. This integration will allow Microsoft Edge users who opt in to browse the Internet more privately, without being tracked across websites.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare is now powering Microsoft Edge Secure Network
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare is now powering Microsoft Edge Secure Network

features.title: D1: open beta is here
features.description: D1 is now in open beta, and the theme is "scale": with higher per-database storage limits and the ability to create more databases, we're unlocking the ability for developers to build production-scale applications on D1.

features.title: New Workers pricing — never pay to wait on I/O again
features.description: Today we are announcing new pricing for Cloudflare Workers and Pages Functions, where you are billed based on CPU time, and never for the idle time that your Worker spends waiting on network requests and other I/O.

imageAssetFile.altText: New Workers pricing — never pay to wait on I/O again

features.title: Race ahead with Cloudflare Pages build caching
features.description: Unleash the fast & furious in your builds with Cloudflare Pages' build caching. Build cache is a feature designed to reduce your build times by caching and reusing previously computed project components. Now in Beta for select frameworks and package managers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Race ahead with Cloudflare Pages build caching

features.title: Re-introducing the Cloudflare Workers Playground
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce an updated Cloudflare Workers playground, where users can develop and test Workers before sharing or deploying them.

features.title: Running Serverless Puppeteer with Workers and Durable Objects
features.description: We've heard from developers that configuring and maintaining their own serverless browser automation systems can be quite painful. The Workers Browser Rendering API solves this

imageAssetFile.altText: Running Serverless Puppeteer with Workers and Durable Objects
imageAssetFile.title: Running Serverless Puppeteer with Workers and Durable Objects

features.title: Post-quantum cryptography goes GA
features.description: Cloudflare announces Post-Quantum Cryptography as a Generally Available system.

features.title: Encrypted Client Hello - the last puzzle piece to privacy
features.description: Today we are excited to announce a contribution to improving privacy for everyone on the Internet.

features.title: Easily manage AI crawlers with our new bot categories
features.description: Manage AI crawlers, out of the box with Cloudflare

imageAssetFile.altText: verified bots categories in firewall rules
imageAssetFile.title: verified bots categories in firewall rules

features.title: Detecting zero-days before zero-day
features.description: In this blog post we talk about our approach and ongoing research into detecting novel web attack vectors in our WAF before they are seen by a security researcher.

features.title: Network performance update: Birthday Week 2023
features.description: We constantly measure our own network's performance against other networks, look for ways to improve our performance compared to them, and share the results of our efforts.

features.title: Privacy-preserving measurement and machine learning
features.description: In 2023, data-driven approaches to making decisions are the norm. We use data for everything from analyzing x-rays to translating thousands of languages to directing autonomous cars.

features.title: See what threats are lurking in your Office 365 with Cloudflare Email Retro Scan
features.description: Use our Retro Scan tool to see what threats lie within your Office 365 mailboxes for free!

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloud Email Security Graph API Retro Scan
imageAssetFile.title: Cloud Email Security Graph API Retro Scan

features.title: Cloudflare is free of CAPTCHAs; Turnstile is free for everyone
features.description: Now that we've eliminated CAPTCHAs at Cloudflare, we want to hasten the demise of CAPTCHAs across the internet. We're thrilled to announce that Turnstile is generally available, and Turnstile's 'Managed' mode is now completely free to everyone for unlimited use.

features.title: Cloudflare now uses post-quantum cryptography to talk to your origin server
features.description: Starting today, you can secure the connection between Cloudflare and your origin server with post-quantum cryptography.
